shots.action_prompt: Camera pans across a futuristic, neon-lit cityscape. We see the HOST, a young and energetic trader, sitting in front of a holographic trading terminal, eyes glued to the screens. Lighting is sleek and dynamic, with pops of color. Character: 주인공. Style: 3D Pixar Animation.

The camera quickly zooms in on the trading terminal, where we see NVDA's stock price skyrocketing. NVDA, an arrogant AI king, appears on the screen, donning a gold crown and smirking confidently. Character: 젠황고양이. Style: 3D Pixar Animation.

shots.dialogue: 우아하하! 이것이 바로 우리가 가는 길, 가즈아!
shots.action_prompt: The scene shifts to TSLA, a crazy-eyed astronaut, rocketing through the air in a Tesla-branded space suit. He's whooping and cheering as his stock price climbs rapidly on the terminal. Character: 일론마고양이. Style: 3D Pixar Animation.

shots.dialogue: 오늘은 우리 모두의 날이다! 가즈아, 가즈아!
shots.action_prompt: The camera pulls back, revealing the HOST, NVDA, and TSLA all celebrating the AI sector rally together. The cityscape is alive with neon lights and holographic displays, creating a vibrant, futuristic atmosphere. Character: ALL. Style: 3D Pixar Animation.
